enhancement_functions.name: recursive_entanglement
enhancement_functions.description: Adds self-referential complexity, making the paradox feed back into itself.

enhancement_functions.name: temporal_folding
enhancement_functions.description: Introduces time-based recursion, where events influence their own past or future.

enhancement_functions.name: ontological_weaponization
enhancement_functions.description: Makes the paradox actively hostile or capable of altering reality through its nature.

enhancement_functions.name: quantum_superposition
enhancement_functions.description: Adds quantum mechanical elements, implying multiple contradictory states simultaneously.

enhancement_functions.name: meta_cognitive_layer
enhancement_functions.description: Adds awareness of being a paradox, allowing it to reflect on its own existence.

enhancement_functions.name: transfinite_recursion
enhancement_functions.description: Extends recursion beyond infinity, suggesting an unending, escalating paradoxical state.

enhancement_functions.name: apophasis_engine
enhancement_functions.description: Makes denial strengthen the paradox, where attempts to refute it validate its truth.

enhancement_functions.name: anthropic_entanglement
enhancement_functions.description: Binds the paradox to consciousness, making its observation or comprehension part of its mechanism.

enhancement_functions.name: semantic_event_horizon
enhancement_functions.description: Creates information black holes, where understanding the paradox leads to loss of other knowledge.

enhancement_functions.name: axiomatic_parasitism
enhancement_functions.description: Embeds in fundamental logic, corrupting the very rules by which reality is understood.

enhancement_functions.name: epistemic_collapse
enhancement_functions.description: Causes a breakdown in knowledge, making certainty impossible.

enhancement_functions.name: narrative_inversion
enhancement_functions.description: Flips the story's inherent logic, making beginnings endings and causes effects.

enhancement_functions.name: probabilistic_destabilization
enhancement_functions.description: Manipulates likelihoods, making improbable events certain and certain events impossible.

enhancement_functions.name: observer_dependency
enhancement_functions.description: The paradox only exists or changes when observed or thought about.

enhancement_functions.name: entropic_reversal
enhancement_functions.description: Reverses the flow of chaos, leading to perfect, but impossible, order.
